preqs: (FIT9132 or FIT5132 or FIT9003 or FIT9019) or equivalentKnowledge of relational database principles, including SQL.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {2402.[5-6], 2411, 2423, 3341.2, 3343, 3348.1, 3349} Do true Otherwise Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT5132, FIT9003, FIT9019, FIT9132}

description: This unit looks at the design and implementation issues of database management systems. Advanced database design using multi-dimensional database design and semi-structured database design are explored. Online analytical query language will be explored in the context of multi-dimensional database design. Query optimisation and tuning will be explored, as well as semi-structure database design and query processing.
